post.body: although i have seen the horns come out on him a few times!! :D
OMG....I know I got really sunburned from it!! And that was the first time I met @ryanwapner He's still just as sweet!!!
yeah I know, but I like the real thing........ahhhhhhhhhhh
yeah she said she saw Ally, Sammy and Brittani, I thought she said she saw you too. and yeah you will see my in MD..
hahaha I rememeber we stood outside for hours and thought nobody else would show up.....Then here comes this big ass bus ;)
what else is there, flavored boners?????? Like chocolate......hahahaha
yes I was there!!!!! I was sad that I didn't see any of you girls at all, and Vik did! I glad she did, cuz it's been ages..BONER :D
yayayayayya.......hey btw, fell better!! If I lived closer, I would so bring you soup!!
now when your car reaches 3000 miles, I hope it starts singing!!!! :D
30th and 31st!!! R U going to any??
I think we should use it in every twitter update we use. Oh BTW, Happy Titty Sprinkle!!!
yeah Brendan said the other day and we don't know why....he was just so random about it!! hahhahaa
I think for the new year, we need to use a word of the day...and todays word,,,,,,of course Titty Sprinkle!!!!
chaaaaa it would be!! hahahaha
Not too many guys can pull off the cute look while the horns are out, but he def. can!!
ok, so I need some ideas for the word of the day!!! I'm thinking ..............BONER!! What do you think??
Pennsylvania Holiday just came on and I started bawlin, cuz it reminded me of how I miss when my kids were little and how excited they were!
DAMN........only 3 days left of my holiday break. This went too fast!
Why do I smell ivory soap all of a sudden?????
